div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 885 Bratovo, c. 4 km. W of Burgas, Bul- garia, 1955 Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 1500 AE. Pot hoard Mesembria: (chiefly Athena rev. but at least 1 with wheel rev.) Odessus Disposition: Burgas 550 (Mesembria of Athena type) Gerasimov, BIAB 21 (1957), p. 323; 22 (1959), p. 361 SM 1958, p. 22
